text: (Tumhi) mage sodalelya gramina lokanna sanga ki lavakaraca tumhi eka mothya suravira janasamuhakade bolavile jala, ki tumhi tyacyasi yud'dha karala kinva te imanadharaka hotila. Tevha jara tumhi ajnapalana karala, tara allaha tumhala phara cangala mobadala pradana karila ani jara tumhi tonda phiravile, jase ki tumhi yapurvi tonda phiravuna ghetale ahe, tara to tumhala duhkhadayaka siksa yatana de'ila
